roles.title: Queen Consort
roles.description: Wife of the King, holds no official power but often acts as advisor and regent

roles.title: Prince
roles.description: Heir to the throne, prepares to assume kingship

roles.title: Duke
roles.description: Ruler of a duchy, appointed by the King

roles.title: Marquess
roles.description: Ruler of a marquessate, appointed by the King

roles.title: Earl
roles.description: Ruler of an earldom, appointed by the King

roles.title: Viscount
roles.description: Ruler of a viscounty, appointed by the King

roles.title: Baron
roles.description: Ruler of a barony, appointed by the King

roles.title: Knight
roles.description: Noble warrior, sworn to protect the kingdom and serve the King

roles.description: Wife of the King, holds no official power but often acts as advisor and regent

roles.title: Dauphin
roles.description: Heir to the throne, prepares to assume kingship
